mapper.sql: A.id AS id,A.serial AS serial,A.main_status AS mainStatus,A.logic_status AS logicStatus,A.type_id AS typeId,A.type_code AS typeCode,A.deleted_at AS deletedAt,A.deleted_by AS deletedBy,A.group_id AS groupId,A.grade_id AS gradeId,A.dict_code AS dictCode,A.user_id AS userId,A.username AS username,A.email AS email,A.phone AS phone,A.tel AS tel,A.discount AS discount,A.money AS money,A.unit AS unit,A.in_or_out AS inOrOut,A.trade_type_code AS tradeTypeCode,A.trade_status_code AS tradeStatusCode,A.fund_opt_type_code AS fundOptTypeCode,A.fund_opt_level_code AS fundOptLevelCode,A.notice_type_code AS noticeTypeCode,A.log_type_code AS logTypeCode,A.pay_time AS payTime,A.pay_way_code AS payWayCode,A.pay_name AS payName,A.trade_user_id AS tradeUserId,A.trade_username AS tradeUsername,A.trade_user_phone AS tradeUserPhone,A.trade_user_email AS tradeUserEmail,A.trade_user_tel AS tradeUserTel,A.avaliable_money_log AS avaliableMoneyLog,A.frozen_money_log AS frozenMoneyLog,A.user_integral AS userIntegral,A.description AS description,A.link_type AS linkType,A.link_id AS linkId,A.owner_id AS ownerId,A.owner_ids AS ownerIds,A.attr_str AS attrStr,A.attr_str2 AS attrStr2,A.attr_int AS attrInt,A.attr_int2 AS attrInt2,A.sequence AS sequence,A.remark AS remark,A.created_at AS createdAt,A.created_by AS createdBy,A.updated_at AS updatedAt,A.updated_by AS updatedBy

,uf.avaliable_money AS avaliableMoney,uf.frozen_money AS frozenMoney ,u.username AS username
,d.code_name AS dictName ,u.serial AS payUserSerial

LEFT JOIN user_fund uf ON uf.user_id = A.user_id LEFT JOIN user u ON u.id = A.user_id
LEFT JOIN dict d ON d.id = A.fund_opt_type_code
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM A
WHERE A.serial = #{serial,jdbcType=VARCHAR} LIMIT 0,1
